sources.title: Invasion U.S.A. (1952) COLD WAR SUSPENSEüçï FULL HD MOVIE
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Director: Alfred E. Green
Stars: Gerald Mohr, Peggie Castle, Dan O'Herlihy
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TXEBMtSqYpWfok-xg95KXao
üçïNEW BRILLIANT HD RESTORATIONüçï
A group of people at a bar witness the unfolding events of a Soviet invasion of the USA!

Step into Cold War-era suspense with this gripping 1950s drama, produced by American Pictures Corp. and directed by Alfred E. Green. A unique blend of political commentary and speculative fiction, this film delivers a chilling portrayal of a hypothetical attack on American soil during the height of post-WWII tensions.

Starring Gerald Mohr, Peggie Castle, Dan O'Herlihy, and Robert Bice, this story unfolds in a New York bar, where a mysterious stranger forewarns patrons of an imminent foreign invasion. As their complacency turns to horror, viewers are taken through a thought-provoking narrative designed to stir patriotism and awareness in an uncertain world.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

üçï Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every Friday on PizzaFLIX.

Backed by cinematography from John L. Russell and a musical score by Albert Glasser, this cautionary tale serves as a striking example of mid-century American propaganda cinema, highlighting fears of nuclear war and communist aggression.

Perfect for fans of historical thrillers, vintage science fiction, and 1950s political drama.

#fullmovie #InvasionUSA1952 #coldwar #1950sMovies #AlfredEGreen #GeraldMohr #PeggieCastle #DanOHeriihy #ClassicSciFi #NuclearAnxiety #Friday@PizzaFLIX #pizzaflix

metadata.Plot: Five people are sitting in a New York bar with a mysterious Mr. Ohman, when they hear the news that the godless Communists are invading the good ol' U.S. of A. The five rush off to various sections of the country to do their part to stop the invasion, when an A-bomb crashes down upon Manhattan.
metadata.Actors: Gerald Mohr, Peggie Castle, Dan O'Herlihy
